title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing finish, the JAR creation fails and the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors' is displayed.
OB: The JAR packager reports open files very late
EB: The JAR creation fails when pressing finish and an error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors' is displayed.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open a file in the project. 2. Make changes to the file but do not save it. 3. Open the JAR packager for the respective project. 4. Enter the required path, destination, and name for the JAR packager. 5. Press finish.
